title: "Nvidia GeForce RTX 3050 Ti, RTX 3050 GPU Clocks, TGP, Other Specs Leaked By Lenovo"
excerpt: "The specs of the unannounced Nvidia GeForce RTX 3050 Ti and RTX 3050 have been leaked by the Chinese multinational tech company Lenovo. A recent report from Videocardz revealed that Lenovo accidentally listed its new Legion gaming notebooks housing the unannounced Nvidia GeForce RTX 3050 Ti and GeForce RTX 3050 GPUs."
